lead_paragraph: Oliver Bjorkstrand scored twice in the third period to help Columbus defeat the Devils for the fourth time this season.

headline.print_headline: Blue Jackets Maintain Edge Over Devils With Lift From Rookie
headline.main: Blue Jackets Maintain Edge Over Devils With Lift From Rookie

snippet: Oliver Bjorkstrand scored twice in the third period to help Columbus defeat the Devils for the fourth time this season.
